verses.verse: {The Vision of the High Priest} d Then I saw Joshua the High Priest standing in the presence of the angel of the Lord , with Satan {The Heb. name Satan means The Opponent or The Accuser} standing at his right to oppose him.
The Lord told Satan, "The Lord rebuke you, Satan in fact, may the Lord who has chosen Jerusalem rebuke you! This man is a burning brand plucked from the fire, is he not?"
Now Joshua was wearing filthy clothes as he stood in the presence of the angel.

So the angel {Lit. So he} continued to tell those who were standing in his presence, "Remove his filthy clothes." And he told Joshua, {Lit. him} "Look how I've removed your iniquity. Now I'm clothing you with fine garments."

Then I said, "Let them place a pure diadem {Or clean turban} on his head." So they placed the pure diadem {Or clean turban} on his head and clothed him with fine garments while the angel of the Lord was standing beside them. {The Heb. lacks beside them}
{The Lord's Charge to Joshua} d Then the angel of the Lord gave this charge to Joshua:

"This is what the Lord of the Heavenly Armies says: «If you will live according to my ways, and if you will keep what I have entrusted to you, {The Heb. lacks to you} then you will also administer my Temple, and you will also guard my courtyards. And I will give you access to these who serve {Lit. stand} here.

«Listen, High Priest Joshua, you and those companions of yours who sit with you, {Lit. sit in your presence} for these men are a sign that I am presenting my servant, the Branch. {Cf. Ps 132:17; Jer 23:5; 33:15}

Look, the stone that I put in place in Joshua's presence on that one stone are seven eyes. {Or facets} And look, I will do the engraving myself,'declares the Lord of the Heavenly Armies, «and I will remove the perversity of that land in a single day.
At that time,'{Lit. day} declares the Lord of the Heavenly Armies, «you will invite each of your neighbors to join you {The Heb. lacks to join you} under the vine and fig tree.»"
